other.title: Legal Complaint to Google
other.sender_name: Parent of child victim of abusive messages
other.principal_name: Parent of child victim of abusive messages

works.complaint:
Abusive information has been posted anonymously on a  

site called little gossip for Fin Evans linked to  Godalming College.  The
 
abusive information is appearing under google search. It is illegal to
post  
grossly offensive messages under section 127 of the communications Act.  
Please block this abusive information permanently and preferably block
this  
pernicious website  from Google search. I will also be reporting this  
posting to CEOP as the victim of abuse is under 18 years old. Thank you.
